name: Get Out (itch) (Uncle Bones)
description:
Get Out is a 5 minute top-down shooter made in a little less than a month. This was also my first game. 

This little project was finished in early May after starting in mid April and now I'm releasing it to the world.

The game features three different weapons, one enemy type with a good few voicelines and the ever looming shadow of death.

Have Fun!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Size: ~50MB
Playtime: ~5 minutes
Requirements: Electricity

;)
